summary: The implementation successfully addresses all core PWA requirements. manifest.json, service worker, index.html meta tags, and service worker registration are implemented. However, REQ-5 (icon generation) is not fulfilled - the implementation references icon paths but does not include the actual icon files in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate app icons as required images to support PWA installation with proper sizes and formats for both Android and iOS devices
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest.json and index.html reference icon paths (/assets/generated/icon-192.dim_192x192.png, icon-512.dim_512x512.png, apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png), but no actual icon image files were added in the diff. Only configuration files reference these icons.

hallucinated_features.description: Service worker caches an additional icon 'recenter-location-icon.dim_32x32.png' that was not mentioned in the BuildRequest image requirements
hallucinated_features.reason: The service worker's STATIC_ASSETS array includes '/assets/generated/recenter-location-icon.dim_32x32.png', which is not listed in the required images (only icon-192, icon-512, and apple-touch-icon were specified)

hallucinated_features.description: Manifest includes optional 'shortcuts' feature with a 'Start Tracking' shortcut
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Push notifications or background sync' and 'Desktop-specific PWA features' as non-goals. While shortcuts are not explicitly forbidden, they were not requested and represent an additional PWA feature beyond the specified requirements.
The categories field was not requested in REQ-1's specification of required manifest fields (name, short_name, theme_color, background_color, display, icons)
